Used as the animation for if an enemy trainer's pokemon is knocked out and they have to switch pokemon.
battleOutcome - Variable in class BattlePanel1
Used to keep track of whether the battle is still raging or not.
BattlePanel1 - class BattlePanel1.
BattlePanel1 is the class responsible for any battles that take place in pokemon.
BattlePanel1.Listener - class BattlePanel1.Listener.
Runs to animate the battle beginning, and keeps track of the pokemons' health.
BattlePanel1.Listener() - Constructor for class BattlePanel1.Listener
 
BattlePanel1.Listener2 - class BattlePanel1.Listener2.
Runs to animate the battle beginning if the user's pokemon is knocked out, and keeps track of the pokemons' health.
BattlePanel1.Listener2() - Constructor for class BattlePanel1.Listener2
 
BattlePanel1.Listener3 - class BattlePanel1.Listener3.
Runs to animate the battle beginning if the enemy trainer's pokemon is knocked out, and keeps track of the pokemons' health.
BattlePanel1.Listener3() - Constructor for class BattlePanel1.Listener3
 
BattlePanel1(Labels, Scoreboard) - Constructor for class BattlePanel1
Constructs a BattlePanel1 that has contact to the scoreboard and labels so it can keep them up to date.

C

commenceBattle(Trainer, Pokemon, Pokemon) - Method in class BattlePanel1
Starts a battle between the trainer and a wild pokemon.
commenceBattle(Trainer, Trainer) - Method in class BattlePanel1
Starts a battle between 2 different trainers or is used when a pokemon is knocked out during a trainer battle and the trainer needs to call another pokemon.
commenceBattle2(Trainer, Pokemon) - Method in class BattlePanel1
Used for when a trainer is fighting a wild pokemon, and his active pokemon is knocked out.
computerAttack() - Method in class BattlePanel1
Code for the enemy pokemon attacking the user's pokemon.

E

endBattle() - Method in class BattlePanel1
Ends the battle with the user running away (no outcome essentially)
endBattle(boolean) - Method in class BattlePanel1
Called when a pokemon is knocked out, it either ends the battle or re-instantiates a new battle with one of the trainer's next pokemon.

F

fight() - Method in class BattlePanel1
Prompts the user which course of action they would like to take in the battle, and then sending them down that course.
